name: style
description: Stencila's visual design resources and style guide
author: https://github.com/stencila/style/graphs/contributors

scripts.css-deploy: npm run css-build && npm run css-postcss && npm run css-gzip
scripts.guide-build-js: cat node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/prismjs/prism.js guide/guide.js | uglifyjs --comments --compress --mangle -- > guide/guide.min.js
scripts.guide-build: npm run guide-build-css && npm run guide-build-js
